class ShaderResource

A class Representing a single shader.

Method Detail

Create

public bool Create( ShaderType type, const string& source );
Creates a shader from source.
Parameters:
shaderType - The type of the shader.
source - The source of the shader.

Load

public bool Load( const string& filename );
Loads a shader from a file. the shader type is determined by the extension of the file: .vshader for a vertex shader, .fshader for a fragment shader.
Parameters:
filename - The file to load.
